more_info.origin: Spiramycins are a class of antibiotics, produced by the mould Streptomyces ambofaciens.
more_info.products: Dairy, meat, egg-products. Only allowed with special permission.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: All religious groups, vegans and vegetarians can use E710.

more_info.origin: Tylosin is an antibiotic, produced by the mould Streptomyces fradiae.
more_info.products: Dairy, meat, egg-products. Only allowed with special permission
more_info.dietary_restrictions: All religious groups, vegans and vegetarians can use E713
